mindsdb/mindsdb

AI/sql platform for running and serving models from databases and apps

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Chat2DB: AI-powered SQL client for managing databases, generating reports, and turning text into queries
  • Graph-vector database for building AI and RAG apps, unifies structure and semantic search
  • Build database-integrated AI agents and applications that connect with your favorite databases and tools
  • portable SQL and AI engine for data-driven apps
  • lets AI apps securely access and explore MySQL databases
  • explore and query multiple databases with AI chat
  • open source database GUI for MySQL, Postgres, SQLite, with AI query help
  • Relational database for multiplayer games
